about_the_game:
The Wolf Armor + Weapon Set is available as an ingame recipe.

Fenrir was a monstrous beast born of the trickster god Loki and a giantess named Angrboða, who caused terror throughout Midgard. It was foretold that he would be the cause of Odin’s demise during Ragnarok, but that prophecy did not come to be. Fenrir was smited by Odin’s son Víðarr before he had the chance to swallow Odin whole.

In honor of Víðarr’s valiant act, weapons and gear were forged by the blacksmith’s of Midgard and are bestowed upon the most worthy of warriors. Don a Wolf Hood as you wield a mighty Iron Wolf Shield and Mace, showing your enemies that you are not a Viking to be trifled with.

The Wolf Armor + Weapon Set is available as an ingame recipe.

Fenrir was a monstrous beast born of the trickster god Loki and a giantess named Angrboða, who caused terror throughout Midgard. It was foretold that he would be the cause of Odin’s demise during Ragnarok, but that prophecy did not come to be. Fenrir was smited by Odin’s son Víðarr before he had the chance to swallow Odin whole.

In honor of Víðarr’s valiant act, weapons and gear were forged by the blacksmith’s of Midgard and are bestowed upon the most worthy of warriors. Don a Wolf Hood as you wield a mighty Iron Wolf Shield and Mace, showing your enemies that you are not a Viking to be trifled with.

name: RUNE II: Wolf Armor + Weapon Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 8.1, & Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 760 / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 8.1, & Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD A-10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Storage: 35 GB available space

short_description: In honor of Víðarr’s valiant act, weapons and gear were forged by the blacksmith’s of Midgard and are bestowed upon the most worthy of warriors. Don a Wolf Hood as you wield a mighty Iron Wolf Shield and Mace, showing your enemies that you are not a Viking to be trifled with.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
*languages with full audio support
